title: Coffee and walnut cake, Marks & SpencerÂ® style
ingredients: ['For the cake', '175g butter, room temperature', '175g golden caster sugar', '3 eggs, beaten', '1 tablespoon instant espresso, dissolved in 1 tablespoon boiling water', '175g self raising flour', '1 pinch salt', '50g chopped walnut pieces', 'For the icing', '5 tablespoons double cream', '1 1/2 tablespoons espresso coffee powder', '160g butter, room temperature', '265g icing sugar, sifted twice', '8 walnut halves']
